custom-sql.sql: SELECT {CTEntryAggregate.*} FROM CTEntryAggregate INNER JOIN CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate ON CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate.ctCollectionId = ?) AND (CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CTEntry.ctEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTCollections_CTEntries ON CTCollections_CTEntries.ctEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId WHERE CTCollections_CTEntries.ctCollectionId = ?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CTEntry.ctEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTEntry.ctEntryId != ?) AND (CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?)
SELECT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTCollections_CTEntries ON CTCollections_CTEntries.ctEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId WHERE CTCollections_CTEntries.ctCollectionId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTEntry.ctEntryId != ?) AND (CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?)

SELECT {CTProcess.*} FROM CTProcess INNER JOIN CTCollection ON CTProcess.ctCollectionId = CTCollection.ctCollectionId INNER JOIN BackgroundTask ON CTProcess.backgroundTaskId = BackgroundTask.backgroundTaskId WHERE (CTProcess.companyId = ?) AND (CTProcess.userId = ?) AND (BackgroundTask.status = ?) AND ( (LOWER(CTCollection.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(CTCollection.description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY CTProcess.createDate DESC
